example.eg: The theatre has two performances per night.
example.egtrans: 这家剧院每晚都有两场演出。

example.eg: Her performance in the movie won her an Oscar.
example.egtrans: 她在这部影片中的表演让她赢得了奥斯卡奖。

example.eg: The singer's microphone cut out during his performance of the national anthem.
example.egtrans: 歌手在演唱国歌时，麦克风突然没声音了。

example.eg: The soldier's performance of his duties was as good as one might expect.
example.egtrans: 这位士兵不负众望，出色地履行了自己的职责。

example.eg: Their performance was first rate, and they did the job completely.
example.egtrans: 他们表现一流，完满地完成了任务。

example.eg: The boy's performance this morning was exemplary. No problem at all.
example.egtrans: 这个男孩儿今早的表现堪称典范，十分完美。

example.eg: The boy put up such a performance that we finally just went home.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （小孩）调皮表现, 捣乱的举动

example.eg: The car's performance on road tests was poor.  The team's excellent performance led to their victory.
example.egtrans: 上路测试时，这辆车的性能很糟糕。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 性能, 效能, 专业能力，技术能力

example.eg: The stock's performance has not been good lately.  In fact, it has declined.
example.egtrans: 近来，股市的行情不太好。事实上，还下跌了。

example.eg: According to Chomsky, performance is external evidence of language competence.
example.egtrans: 根据乔姆斯基的观点，言语行为是语言能力的外在表现。

example.eg: What a performance getting the children ready for the party!
example.egtrans: 让孩子们做好准备开派对真是件麻烦的事！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 麻烦的事, 忙乱, 麻烦

example.eg: He sat there picking his nose throughout the entire performance.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 整个演出, 整个表演

example.eg: Peter loves high-performance cars.
Every employee has a job performance review at the end of each year.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 工作绩效评估，工作绩效考评

example.eg: The band gave a live performance of their new song.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 现场演出, 现场表演
表现不佳, 成绩不佳

dsense.name: nonperformance, also UK: non-performance
dsense.guideword: (not related to public performance) (指音乐或戏剧等)

example.eg: I was at peak performance in my mid 30s.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 表演艺术, 行为艺术

dsense.name: performance bond
dsense.guideword: (bond insuring that contracted work will be completed)

example.eg: The company has hired a consultant to analyze performance management.
After a performance review is an appropriate time for a pay raise.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 绩效评估，绩效考核，业绩考评
性能强化的, 体制强化的
绩效相关的，业绩相关的

example.eg: He was fired because of his poor performance at work.
The orchestra gave a repeat performance.
We don't want a repeat performance of last year's picnic when everyone got sick.
They're putting on some kind of theatrical performance at the church hall tonight.
